name: ASMR-Paint
description:
ASMR-Paint. Find your sweet spot! 

Design a personal ASMR experience while basking in the splendor of your own MS-Paint style creations.  Headphones are required.

Left click to activate or move sounds. Hold right click and drag to set a path. Enjoy!

Design, art and audio by Stephanie Engelbrecht
Programming by HexGridLife

Made for the MS-Paint Game Jam 2017
